title: Adobe Illustrator CC 2015 (v19.0) x86-x64 RUS-ENG{by M0nkrus}=-T
description:
Software Version: 2015.0.0 (19.0.0.44)
assembly Author : m0nkrus
Language: English / Russian
Treatment: complete
Type of medicine: keygen + patched files
System requirements:
- Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 64
- Microsoft Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 or Windows SP 8.x
- 1 GB RAM (3 GB) for 32-bit versions; 2 GB of RAM (8GB recommended) for 64 bit version
- 2 GB of free hard disk space for installation; additional free space required during installation (can not install on removable storage devices based on flash memory)
- Screen resolution of 1024 x 768 (1280 x 800 recommended)
- To view Illustrator HiDPI mode monitor must support resolution of at least 1920x1080
- OpenGL 4. x
- To use the new operating environment "Touch Control" in Illustrator, you need a tablet / monitor with touch input running Windows 8.1 (it is recommended to use Microsoft Surface Pro 3)
- For use performance GPU: (The following video card NVIDIA (recommended medium or a professional level), 1 GB of memory (2 GB recommended) and latest drivers for optimal performance
- following a series of video cards support the function of GPU performance on Windows in Annex Illustrator: Series of NVIDIA Quadro K, NVIDIA Quadro 6xxx, NVIDIA Quadro 5xxx, NVIDIA Quadro 4xxx, NVIDIA Quadro 2xxx, NVIDIA Quadro 2xxxD, NVIDIA Quadro 6xx, series NVIDIA GeForce GTX (4xx, 5xx, 6xx, 7xx, Titan), Intel HD Graphics 4000 series, Intel HD Graphics 5000 series, Intel Iris Graphics 5000 series, Intel Iris Pro Graphics AMD 5000 Series Adapters following series are only supported in Windows 8 (or later): A series of graphics cards AMD Radeon R9, series graphics cards AMD Radeon R7, series graphics cards AMD Radeon HD 7000 series graphics cards AMD Radeon HD 8000
- to Access to online services require an Internet connection and registration

Description: Adobe Illustrator CC 2015
- is accepted as the industry standard vector graphics software, used extensively by designers in various fields of digital graphics, illustrations and printing, the development of all types of multimedia resources, such as the printed materials, online content,
interactive media, video and mobile applications. Adobe Illustrator CC 2015 is part of the Creative Cloud. Therefore, its users access to all the latest updates, and access to new versions available from the date of their issue.
Improve your skills and master new tools thanks to the large and ever-growing collection of instructional videos. Through integration with Behance can share their projects with other users and receive instant feedback on their work from designers from around the world.

List of changes
What changed me:

- From the original ESD-distribution, containing Russian and English languages, removed all other language packs.
- 32-bit and 64-bit distributions are combined in a single installer.
- A number of the original files for patched installer replaced (cracked PAINTER ) , so the opportunity to integrate the updates in the distribution.
- The distribution is integrated with the utility Adobe Update Management Tool 8.0 (developed PAINTER ), which is able to set up a "cloud" of renovation.
- In the folder Crack in the image are a set of tools and detailed instructions to register the Adobe Illustrator CC 2015.
